sourcesContent:
import { Component, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { deleteTask, deleteTaskNOAPI, getStateFromApi, getTask, stepCompleted, stepUndo, toogleShow, toogleShowAPI, updateShowAPI } from "../redux/actions" import TodoSubList from './todosublist' import "../css/progress.css" const ShowListItem = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const tempState = useSelector(state => state) const selector = tempState[props.category] console.log("props category", props.category) console.log("selector state", selector) console.log("props category array", selector[props.category]) //update state show on database const toogleUpdate = (input) => { dispatch(toogleShow(input)) dispatch(toogleShowAPI(input)) console.log("input show", input) } if (Object.keys(selector).length >= 1) { console.log("inside showItem", selector) console.log("using selector len", Object.keys(selector)) let mapper = Object.keys(selector).map(input =>
{console.log("input", selector[input])} {(Object.keys(selector[input].steps).length == 0) ? <>
{selector[input].task}
{selector[input].completed === 1 ? <> : }
{selector[input].dateB}
{selector[input].dateE}
: <>
{selector[input].task}
<> {selector[input].completed === 1 && }
{selector[input].dateB}
{selector[input].dateE}
{console.log("input.date", selector[input].dateB)} {console.log("input.steps", selector[input].steps)}
{(Object.keys(selector[input].steps).length >= 1 && selector[input].show === true) && }
}
) return mapper } return null } export default ShowListItem
